markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Vaklish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1558)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Vaklish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1558)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Rakshasa" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=233" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 54</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Vudrani](/Languages.aspx?ID=45)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +23, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +26, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +20, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +6

**Con** +4

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_wand of [vampiric exsanguination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=353)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +23 

+2 status to all saves vs. magic, +3 status to all saves vs. [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) magic
</row>

**HP** 185

**Resistances**
physical 12 (except piercing)

**Weaknesses**
good 10

Scoff at the Divine [reaction] **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet casts a [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) spell or uses a divine ability. **Requirements** The raja rakshasa has an unexpended spell slot that can be used to cast [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78). **Effect** The raja rakshasa expends a spell slot that could be used to cast _dispel magic_ and attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell or ability. The raja rakshasa can't Scoff at the Divine for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d10+11 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d8+11 slashing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 32, attack +24
- **Cantrips (6th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Hypnotic Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=157), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273), [Synaptic Pulse](/Spells.aspx?ID=327) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (3 slots)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 32
- **3rd**
[Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (at will)

**Occult Rituals** DC 32

- **2nd**
[Create Undead](/Rituals.aspx?ID=10)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The raja rakshasa takes on the appearance of any Medium [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This doesn't change the raja rakshasa's Speed or its attack and damage modifiers with its Strikes but might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning). It typically loses its fangs Strike unless the humanoid form has fangs or a similar unarmed attack.

**Disturbing Vision** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The raja rakshasa's eyes flash green as it projects a telepathic wave in a 30-foot emanation. All creatures in the area are assailed by a vision of evil decadence from one of the rakshasa's past lives. Each non-evil creature in the area must succeed at a DC 32 Will save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (and [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) on a critical failure). The visions last 1d4 rounds, and while they do, the raja rakshasa and all evil creatures in the area gain a +1 status bonus to all checks. The raja rakshasa can use this ability again only once the previous visions end.

</column>
name: Vaklish

The raja rakshasa can use this ability again only once the previous visions end.
